about_the_game:
Customize your very own bioroids in the Bioroid Customizer App and submit your creations to the monthly contest on the Herogrinder official site!

Submissions will be displayed on our contest page where everyone can vote on their favorites and share them on social media. The bioroid with the most votes at the end of the month will be printed in 3D and sent to the winner.

The app includes 6 body types, 30 unique weapons, 14 armors, over 50 accessories, and many pattern textures and decals. Each armor and weapon also has three color themes, so the possible combinations for character creation are virtually endless.

You can take screenshots of your creations through the app, save them for later, share them to social media, and submit them to the Bioroid Customization Contest.

We will be updating the app on a regular basis, adding new features and gear (like stances, weapons, armor, and accessories) to have even more variation during bioroid customization.

Download the Bioroid User Manual and the Equipment Catalogue from the sidebar for a comprehensive list of bioroid builds and available equipment.

Create, share, vote, and win!

>>> W0RM INTRUSION DETECTED

name: Herogrinder: Tactical Combat Arenas Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 5770 (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

Submissions will be displayed on our website where everyone can vote on their favorites. The bioroid with the most votes at the end of the month will be printed in 3D and sent to the winner.
